name: One Screen Run
description:
< How to play >

It's very simple to play! Just click at the right moment to jump!
Collect all the coins scattered throughout the stage to clear the stage!

< Mission >

Every stage has a minimum number of jumps.
Complete all missions!

----- Controls -----

< Game >

* Mouse Click or [Space] - Jump
* [P] - Pause
* [R] - Retry
* [Q] - Quit

< Pause Menu and Result Menu >

* Mouse Click - Decide
* [Space] - Continue and Next Stage
* [P] - Continue
* [R] - Retry
* [Q] - Quit
